mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM t_menu m LEFT JOIN t_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{user}
SELECT m.* FROM t_menu m LEFT JOIN t_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE rm.role_id = #{role}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_menu SET `status` = #{status} WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{pid}, pids)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_menu WHERE (FIND_IN_SET(#{id}, pids) or id = #{id})
